title: Ys X: Nordics - Advanced Pack
description: A pack of various items to give your adventure an extra boost.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
A pack of various items to give your adventure an extra boost.

　● Nourishing Liquid Medicine Set
　　- Heal Potion II
　　- R Potion
　　- Golden Mead
　● Deluxe Box Lunch Set
　　- Plain Box Lunch (XL)
　　- Colorful Dessert Box Lunch
　　- Seafood Supreme Box Lunch
　● Quadruple Elixir Set
　　- Strength Elixir x4
　　- Break Elixir x4
　　- Defense Elixir x4
　　- Vitality Elixir x4
　　- Luck Elixir x4
　● Quadruple Arcanum Set
　　- Ascetic's Arcanum x4
　● Extra Crystal Shard Set
　　- Crystal Shard x60000
　● Ship Supply Set
　　- Repair Kit x50
　　- Super Repair Kit x30
　　- Extinguisher x10
　　- Defroster x10
　　- Blue Crystal Water x10
　　- Green Crystal Water x10
　● Extra Basic Material Set
　　- Basic Craft Stock x600
　　- Basic Reagents x600
　　- Basic Beast Parts x600
　　- Basic Ingredients x600
　● Rare Material Set B
　　- Cureleaf x20
　　- Sun Nectar x20
　　- Melg Flower x20
　　- Plump Fish Meat x20
　　- Rich Game Meat x20
　　- Munir Clam x20
　　- Eryn Mushroom x20
　● Rare Material Set C
　　- Blacksilver Sand x10
　　- Soul Timber x10
　　- Crystalucent Coral x10
　　- Steely Bone x10
　　- Everlasting Leather x10
　　- Vajra Bone x10
　● Rare Material Set D
　　- Red Herb x10
　　- Dryad Tear x10
　　- Schneeblauchen x10
　　- Silver Cheese x10
　　- Golden Potato x10
　　- Aurora Berries x10
　　- Ultimate Beast Meat x10
　　- Supreme Fish Meat x10
　● Mana Material Set II
　　- Red Lump x20
　　- Blue Lump x20
　　- Yellow Lump x20
　　- Dark Lump x20
　　- Rainbow Lump x10
　● Mana Material Set III
　　- Red Seastone x10
　　- Blue Seastone x10
　　- Yellow Seastone x10
　　- Dark Seastone x10
　　- Rainbow Seastone x5
　● Fishing Bait G Set
　　- Fishing Bait G x30
　● Spirit Set
　　- Spirit Cape
　　- Spirit Charm
　　- Spirit Necklace
　● Lv. II Mana Seed Set
　　- Sword Star+ x2
　　- Axe Star+ x2
　　- Shield Star+ x2
　　- Armor Star+ x2
　　- Chalice Star+ x2
　　- Lyre Star+ x2
　　- Abiding Love+ x2
　● Lv. III Mana Seed Set
　　- Sword Soul+ x2
　　- Axe Soul+ x2
　　- Shield Soul+ x2
　　- Armor Soul+ x2
　　- Chalice Soul+ x2
　　- Lyre Soul+ x2
　　- Limitless Courage+ x2
　● Mana Seed of Darkness Set
　　- Sin Seal+ x3
　　- Punishment Seal+ x3
　　- Sin Star+ x3
　　- Punishment Seal+ x3
　　- Sin Soul+ x3
　　- Punishment Soul+ x3

*These items can also be obtained through standard gameplay.
*Items can be obtained by selecting the purchased content in the "DLC" tab of your Inventory, accessed via the Main Menu ingame.
*Please note that any items exceeding the maximum carrying capacity will be lost when claimed.
